name: Alien Nursery Evacuation Plan (GMTK-2021)
description:
Test your puzzling skills with this 15 level game, built by one person working alone over 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Games Jam.

Controls are all on the keyboard:

  • Cursors/WASD - Move selected alien
  • Space/tab - Cycle through selectable aliens (adding shift cycles in reverse)
  • R - Reset level
  • M - Mute music
  • <, > - Cycle through levels
  • Esc - Quit game

Credits:

  • Game design, code, gfx, sfx: Chris Underwood
  • Playtesting: Sam Vickery
  • Shapes: Freya "Acegikmo" Holmér
  • Music is from an old game of mine, originally licensed via SoundDogs
